articles.title: What's behind Starmer's notable shift on closer ties to Europe? - BBC
articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer has given details of his plans for a "Brexit reset". What could it mean for the UK?
articles.content:
Faisal IslamEconomics editor
The prime minister's very notable tilt on the UK's ties to the European Union post-Brexit on Saturday was designed to send a message to business, to Brussels and to othe… [+3528 chars]
